warnings.message: Primary output assembly should be set when using assemblies (primaryOutputAssemblyId missing)
S16b: station bouncing detected for station 'expo' in track 'default'. The build leaves this station and returns to it later within the same grouping.
S22: input assembly 'container_7in_bg' has no producing step. Ensure this is intentional.
S22: input assembly 'lid_7in' has no producing step. Ensure this is intentional.
S23: step at 'garnish' inputs from 'waterbath'. This hides a transfer inside the step. Fix: set input.from.stationId='garnish' to trigger derived transfer.
S23: step at 'expo' inputs from 'garnish'. This hides a transfer inside the step. Fix: set input.from.stationId='expo' to trigger derived transfer.
S23: step at 'expo' inputs from 'vending'. This hides a transfer inside the step. Fix: set input.from.stationId='expo' to trigger derived transfer.
